name: 25 Days 2 Go
description: A plane crashes into the side of a snowy mountain in the middle of nowhere. 4 people emerge from the wreckage. They hear a radio message from the planes emergency radio. A static filled voice that barely can be heard...... coordinates.... 25 days till extraction...... You must make your way down the mountain and get to the extraction point to be rescued but you won't be able to do it alone. You'll need the help of your fellow survivors to make it out of this. Can you survive in the harsh cold unforgiving wilderness for 25 days? Only time will tell.......Only 25 days 2 go.
